name: Steak & Sweet Potato
description: Perfectly cooked steak with caramelized sweet potatoes. An athlete favorite.

instructions.instruction: Remove steaks from refrigerator 30 minutes before cooking.
instructions.tip: Room temperature meat cooks more evenly.

instructions.instruction: Toss potatoes with 1 tbsp olive oil and salt. Spread on baking sheet.
Season both sides of steaks with salt and pepper.
Heat cast iron skillet over very high heat. Add oil.
Sear steaks to desired doneness: Medium-rare 3 min per side, Medium 4 min per side.
instructions.tip: Don't flip constantly - patience creates a great crust.

instructions.instruction: In the last minute, add butter, garlic, and herbs. Baste the steak.
Lightly sauté spinach, serve with steak and potatoes.

tips: Beef is rich in creatine and iron.
Cast iron pan gives the best crust.
storageInfo: Cooked steak can be refrigerated for 2-3 days.
servingSuggestion: Serve with mushroom sauce or fresh salad.
variations: Ribeye can be used instead of sirloin.
Regular mashed potatoes can replace sweet potato.
